pullrequest.title: Create an EventManager to be used on a per SimulationRunner basis.

content.raw:
So we may not need both, but I wanted to provide a quick context as to why both exist.

In this case, `Init` is called after the constructor \(in [ServerPrivate.cc](http://ServerPrivate.cc)\). The Plugin loader will actually call the constructor, this is to provide the additional SDF data that the plugin may need for initialization \(or configuration?\)

`Configure` is called once the System has been given to the SimulationRunner, and provides an opportunity for the system to add additional entities or components as needed, as well as register for events.

I think that the names could be easily switched, but they could potentially be condensed by reading the SDF inside the simulationrunner.  I’ll take a look.
